trans-unit.source: Indicates the first day of the week to use when calling date-related functions.
trans-unit.target: Indica o primeiro dia da semana para utilizar quando chamar funções relacionadas com a data.

trans-unit.source: When you call date-related functions, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamar funções relacionadas com a data, pode utilizar os seguintes membros de enumeração no seu código em vez dos valores reais.

trans-unit.source: Some date-related functions take a `DayOfWeek` argument, a `WeekOfYear` argument, or both.
trans-unit.target: Algumas funções relacionadas com a data demorar um `DayOfWeek` argumento, uma `WeekOfYear` argumento ou ambos.

trans-unit.source: The `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration specifies the valid values for the `DayOfWeek` arguments, as well as the possible return values from the functions.
trans-unit.target: O `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeração Especifica os valores válidos para o `DayOfWeek` argumentos, bem como os valores de retorno possíveis de funções.

trans-unit.source: The `DayOfWeek` argument takes the `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: O `DayOfWeek` argumento demora a `FirstDayOfWeek` membros de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Date-related functions also return `FirstDayOfWeek` values (except `System`).
trans-unit.target: Também devolvem funções relacionadas com a data `FirstDayOfWeek` valores (exceto `System`).

trans-unit.source: Friday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbFriday" name="vbFriday" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sexta-feira este membro é equivalente à constante de Visual Basic <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbFriday" name="vbFriday" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Monday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbMonday" name="vbMonday" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Segunda este membro é equivalente à constante de Visual Basic <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbMonday" name="vbMonday" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: Sábado este membro é equivalente à constante de Visual Basic <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbSaturday" name="vbSaturday" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Sunday (default) This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbSunday" name="vbSunday" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Domingo (predefinição), este membro é equivalente à constante de Visual Basic <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbSunday" name="vbSunday" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The first day of the week as specified in your system settings This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbUseSystemDayOfWeek" name="vbUseSystemDayOfWeek" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro dia da semana conforme especificado nas definições do sistema este membro é equivalente à constante de Visual Basic <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbUseSystemDayOfWeek" name="vbUseSystemDayOfWeek" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Thursday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbThursday" name="vbThursday" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é equivalente à constante de Visual Basic de quinta-feira <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbThursday" name="vbThursday" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Tuesday This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbTuesday" name="vbTuesday" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Terça-feira este membro é equivalente à constante de Visual Basic <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbTuesday" name="vbTuesday" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Quarta-feira este membro é equivalente à constante de Visual Basic <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbWednesday" name="vbWednesday" href=""> </xref>.
